name: ARCTIC FOX Vegan and Cruelty-Free Semi-Permanent Hair Color Dye (4 Fl Oz, VIRGIN PINK)
short_description: Picture this: You’re laying on the beach with flowers in your hair. Ready to bring those tropical vibes everywhere you go with Virgin Pink? This vibrant hot pink will give a deep magenta tint to light brown hair, and will turn out most vibrantly on pre lightened hair - no need to fear brassy tones with this shade. Try mixing with some Wrath for a deeper pink!
#AFProTip: Want a lighter pastel pink hue? Start off with an Arctic Mist Diluter base, add drops of Virgin Pink until you've mixed the hue you want!
Made only from vegan ingredients with no animal by-products. No harmful chemicals in Arctic Fox hair dye that damage the hair like chemical based hair colors.
Arctic Fox hair dyes are gentle for frequent use and actually conditions your hair as it restores vibrancy.
Long lasting Colors, Smears Less, Sweet Scent, No Peroxide, No Ammonia, No Ethyl Alcohol, No PPD.

name: Good Dye Young Semi Permanent Hair Dye (Rock Lobster Red) - Conditioning Red Hair Dye - PPD free & Vegan - Lasts 15-24+ Washes for Streaks and Strands
short_description: PUNK ROCK RED HAIR DYE! Our Good Dye Young Hair Dye semi permanent combines salon-grade pigments with a nontoxic, conditioning formula that deposits ultra-vibrant color. Our temporary hair dye combines a high-quality cream base with essential oil benefits.

RED LOBSTER COLOR: Our semi permanent hair color hair dye does not damage the hair, in fact, they’re super conditioning. The color in our color changing hair dye is deposited on top of the hair shaft and acts like a stain that will fade out over time each time you wash your hair (lasts 15-24+ washes)

NATURAL INGREDIENTS: This non permanent hair color is fragranced with the essential oil Bergamot, known for its mood-lifting properties. Our temp hair color uses Sunflower Extract to add UV protection to shield hair from the sun and hot tools that cause color fading. Vegan, Cruelty-Free, & Made in the U.S.A.!

HOW TO USE: This temp hair dye color shows best on level 10 light blonde hair. Lighten your hair using our Lightening Kit & squeeze out some color into our Tool Kit. Wear gloves to prevent staining. Do a strand test with this temporary red hair dye before dividing your hair into 4 sections & applying it all over! Make sure the color is fully saturated. Let sit for 30 minutes before rinsing out with cool water.

ABOUT GDY: Good Dye Young was created by Hayley Williams, lead singer of the Grammy Award-winning band Paramore, and her longtime hairstylist and makeup artist, Brian O’Connor. GDY comes with a vision to create a community around self-expression, color, and happiness about being who you are.

EASY TO USE: Requiring no bowl or brush, just need to put on gloves, and use it the same as normal shampoo, wait for only 15 - 20 minutes(For full coverage of grey hair stay time 20 minutes), Our hair dye shampoo for women and men will cover all your grays! Doesn't stain your skin.

name: Overtone Semi Permanent Hair Color Conditioner, Cherry Chestnut, 8 oz, Nourishing, Damage-Free, Color Depositing Mask for All Hair Types with Shea Butter & Coconut Oil, Vegan & Cruelty-Free
short_description: Vibrant Semi-Permanent Color Conditioner: A hydrating treatment hair mask that restores and colors your hair, it's simple right? Do it yourself at home! Infused with nourishing moisture and natural oils, achieve semi-permanent hair color results in just 15 minutes

Color Despositing Semi Permanent Hydrating Hair Mask for all Hair Types: Designed for all hair textures including color-treated, natural, curly, straight or coily hair. Pastels work best for light hair or a bleached base; Vibrant & Extreme shades show on brown hair. For a more saturated color add our bleach

Damage-Free, Vibrant Hair Color at Home: This semi-permanent color-depositing mask delivers rich, fade-resistant pigment while moisturizing and protecting hair with shea butter, coconut oil, and avocado oil. Get bold color and healthy shine—no damage, no harsh ingredients

Easy 10–15 Minute Application: Get bold, salon-quality results at home with our semi permanent color depositing masks. Apply Overtone hair color conditioner generously to dry hair. Leave on for 10–15 minutes, rinse with warm water. Results last 3–5 weeks depending on hair type, base color and hair care routine

Salon-Quality, Vegan Haircare for All Hair Types: We believe bold color starts with healthy hair. Our clean, color-safe formulas are cruelty-free, and designed for every hair type and texture. Made without parabens, sulfates, or harsh ingredients for vibrant, nourished results you can feel good about

short_description: COLOR DREAM - dpHUE’s Color Dream is an ammonia free, zero-lift, demi-permanent hair color that lasts up to 16 shampoos. Get surreal dimension and shine by enhancing color and boosting shine & softness for virgin, color-treated, or highlighted hair.
ENHANCE YOUR CURRENT HUE - This at-home hair dye is virtually fail-proof. In just 20 minutes, achieve the hair color of your dreams that feels soft, nourished, and conditioned.

PRO TIPS - Color-treated hair? Refresh lengths & ends without worrying about the line of demarcation. Highlights? Select the lightest shade of your highlight. Virgin hair? Enhance natural color & boost shine.
EIGHT NATURAL SHADES - Available in eight natural shades. Not meant for drastic color changes. Have highlights? Choose the lightest shade of your highlight.
